abstract: With the end of the trip approaching, the author had the two best days of riding of the entire journey.
snippet: With the end of the trip approaching, the author had the two best days of riding of the entire journey.
lead_paragraph: DANVILLE, Pa. -- The closer you get to the end of a long journey, the more powerful the tug of home becomes. As the finish line begins to seem inevitable, the whole trip starts to feel as though it's in the past while it's still going on.

headline.main: In Pennsylvania, Feeling the Tug of Home
